statements: SELECT * FROM payment_status_updates WHERE user_id = 3;
SELECT status_message, transaction_id FROM payment_status_updates WHERE status_id = 5;
SELECT user_id, status_message FROM payment_status_updates ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM payment_status_updates WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT status_id, user_id, timestamp FROM payment_status_updates WHERE status_message LIKE '%success%';
SELECT * FROM payment_status_updates WHERE user_id = 1 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT status_id, transaction_id, status_message FROM payment_status_updates WHERE status_message LIKE '%success%';
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) AS total_updates FROM payment_status_updates GROUP BY user_id ORDER BY total_updates DESC;
SELECT status_id, timestamp FROM payment_status_updates WHERE transaction_id IN (101, 102, 103) AND status_message IS NOT NULL;
SELECT MAX(timestamp) AS latest_update FROM payment_status_updates;
SELECT * FROM payments WHERE payment_status = 'success';
SELECT user_id, payment_amount FROM payments WHERE user_id = 123 ORDER BY payment_amount DESC;
SELECT notification_message FROM payment_notifications WHERE transaction_id = 456;
SELECT payment_status, payment_amount FROM payments WHERE payment_amount > 100 ORDER BY payment_amount ASC;
SELECT transaction_id, payment_amount, payment_status FROM payments WHERE user_id = 789;
SELECT * FROM payments WHERE user_id = 12345 AND payment_amount > 100 ORDER BY transaction_id DESC;
SELECT payment_amount, payment_status FROM payments WHERE payment_status = 'SUCCESS' GROUP BY payment_amount;
SELECT transaction_id, payment_amount FROM payments WHERE payment_status = 'PENDING' OR payment_status = 'FAILED';
SELECT * FROM payments JOIN payment_notifications ON payments.transaction_id = payment_notifications.transaction_id WHERE payments.payment_amount < 50;
SELECT payment_amount, COUNT(transaction_id) AS transaction_count FROM payments GROUP BY payment_amount HAVING transaction_count > 1 ORDER BY transaction_count DESC;
SELECT * FROM successful_transactions;
SELECT user_id, amount, status FROM failed_transactions ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT transaction_id, user_id, amount FROM pending_transactions WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT * FROM successful_transactions WHERE status = 'completed';
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) as total_transactions FROM failed_transactions GROUP BY user_id;
SELECT * FROM successful_transactions WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT user_id, status FROM pending_transactions WHERE status = 'pending' ORDER BY user_id ASC;
SELECT transaction_id, user_id, amount FROM failed_transactions WHERE reason LIKE '%insufficient funds%' LIMIT 10;
SELECT user_id, count(*) as total_transactions FROM successful_transactions GROUP BY user_id HAVING total_transactions > 5 ORDER BY total_transactions DESC;
SELECT MAX(amount) as max_amount, MIN(amount) as min_amount FROM pending_transactions
SELECT * FROM payments;
SELECT user_id, amount, payment_date FROM payments WHERE status='approved';
SELECT payment_id, user_id, amount, payment_date FROM payments WHERE payment_date < '2022-03-15';
SELECT user_id, first_name, last_name FROM users WHERE user_id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT user_id, message FROM notifications WHERE send_date >= '2022-04-01' ORDER BY send_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM payments WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY payment_date DESC;
SELECT users.first_name, users.last_name, payments.amount FROM users INNER JOIN payments ON users.user_id = payments.user_id WHERE payments.status = 'completed';

SELECT transactions.transaction_id, transactions.transaction_date, payments.amount FROM transactions LEFT JOIN payments ON transactions.payment_id = payments.payment_id WHERE transactions.success = TRUE;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(notification_id) AS num_notifications FROM notifications GROUP BY user_id HAVING num_notifications > 2;
SELECT users.first_name, users.last_name, notifications.message FROM users LEFT JOIN notifications ON users.user_id = notifications.user_id ORDER BY notifications.send_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM payments;
SELECT user_id, amount FROM payments WHERE status='pending';
SELECT * FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE username LIKE 'john%';
SELECT transaction_id, status, amount FROM transactions ORDER BY amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM payments ORDER BY user_id DESC, amount ASC;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE username LIKE 'A%' AND email LIKE '%gmail.com';
SELECT payment_id, amount, status FROM payments WHERE status = 'pending' OR status = 'failed' AND amount > 100;
SELECT notification_id, message, created_at FROM notifications ORDER BY created_at DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT t.transaction_id, t.status, tl.log_message FROM transactions t JOIN transaction_logs tl ON t.transaction_id = tl.transaction_id WHERE t.amount > 500;
